thread.title: Oregon State Beavers to wear black helmets for first time in 2015 at Arizona
thread.title_full: Oregon State Beavers to wear black helmets for first time in 2015 at Arizona | OregonLive.com

author: Danny Moran | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Oregon State Beavers to wear black helmets for first time in 2015 at Arizona
text:
Oregon State will break out its black helmets for the first time this season while playing in the heat of Tucson.
The Beavers will also wear white jerseys and black pants against Arizona on Saturday, completing a uniform combination they last wore against USC on Sept. 27, 2014 . They wore black helmets six times in 12 games last season, making it the team's most frequently used headgear.
The team announced its decision Wednesday on Twitter.
The uni combo for Saturday's matchup with Arizona. ðŸ”¥ðŸ”¥ #gobeavs pic.twitter.com/2utR3P1DLf
â€” Beavers Football (@OSUBeaversFB) October 8, 2015 Below are links to the previous uniform combinations Oregon State has worn this year.
Home vs. Weber State : white-black-white
Away at Michigan : white-white-black
Home vs. San Jose State : white-white-white
Home vs. Stanford : all orange
-- Danny Moran
dmoran@oregonian.com
